verbs.description: [V: atlanta] [ARG1: public schools] announce 2018 - 2019 school calendar besides adding 30 minutes to students’ school days from jan 29 to march 30 to make up for days missed as a result of weather atlanta public schools have also been creating the 2018 - 2019 school calendar atlanta public schools school
